name: ray-tower
description: A NodeJS program to create a Ray-Net tower. A Ray-Tower is just a server that bounces the signal of a request to all paired towers in its network. This progect will eventually use PGP to encrypt communication. Also, a Ray-Tower keeps no records of the requests made through it! A Sharding protocol using Slice-Net will also be implemented!
author: Ray-Voice, Anna-Voice, Alina-Voice
